name: project2
description: VERB 		 | 		  PATH 		 |  	 DESCRIPTION ------------ | ------------- | ------------------- GET | /api/v1/fabrics/ | index of fabrics | GET | /api/v1/fabrics/:id | show page for selected fabrics | GET | /api/v1/fabrics/new | page to add fabrics | POST | /api/v1/fabrics/ | add a fabric | GET | /api/v1/fabrics/:id/edit | page to edit a fabric | PUT | /api/v1/fabrics/:id | edit/update a fabric | DELETE | /api/v1/fabrics/:id | delete a fabric |
